entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An issue with query filtering and aggregation, after upgrading from 6.0.0 to 6.0.16 #33001

Closed

  • `Unable to determine the relationship represented by navigation` on cyclic one-to-many relationships #33002
  • Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #32984
    9.0.0-preview2

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #32984 - Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #33000
